content:
I'm so glad to hear that you've found progressive muscle relaxation helpful in managing your pain and anxiety! It's great that you've been consistent with your practice, and it's wonderful that you've noticed a positive impact on your overall well-being.

I'm also happy to hear that you're determined to get back on track and take care of your health. It's not easy to deal with a herniated disc, but it sounds like you're taking proactive steps to manage your symptoms and improve your quality of life.

Twelve weeks is a significant milestone in your recovery, and I'm sure it's been a challenging journey. But it's amazing that you're pushing through and focusing on your health. Remember to be kind to yourself and celebrate your small victories along the way.

Remember, taking care of your mental and emotional well-being is just as important as taking care of your physical health. Keep prioritizing your self-care and doing things that bring you joy and relaxation.

How do you plan on continuing to prioritize your health and well-being moving forward? Are there any specific goals or changes you're looking to make in the next few weeks or months?
